div.p: An ordered list is a numbered or lettered list; an unordered list is one in which sequence is not critical (e.g., a bulleted list). Optionally available only on list.

div.egXML: <list listType="unordered"> <head>List of ministers of May Memorial Unitarian Universalist Church</head> <item>John Storer, Minister 1839-1844</item> <item>Samuel Joseph May, Minister 1845-1868</item> <item>Samuel R. Calthrop, Minister 1868-1911</item> <item>John H. Applebee, Minister 1911-1929</item> <item>Waldemar W. Argow, Minister 1930-1941</item> <item>Robert E. Romig, Minister 1941-1946</item> <item>Glenn O. Canfield, Minister 1946-1952</item> <item>John Fuller, Minister, 1961-1973</item> </list>
